p: According to the Chinese COVID-19 treatment guideline at that time [ 7], on Day 8, we changed the cefuroxime and traditional Chinese medicine to interferon atomization (5 million bid), ribavirin (150 mg TID), and abidol (200 mg TID) for antiviral treatment. Meanwhile, the moxifloxacin (400 mg QD) was given to the patient for preventing bacterial infection.
